item.title: Feeling Comfortable
item.description: A bit of a problem Anyone who’s read any of my previous posts will know that I’m dissatisfied with my gender. There are some aspects of being a male that don’t appeal to me personally. As a possible solution, I’ve thought about hormone therapy as an avenue to resolving my gender dysphoria. This is a difficult decision to make, not so much because I don’t want to do it, but rather the heavy and permanent consequences associated with it.
